You have access to Cangjie LSP tools for code intelligence on .cj source files.

## Available Tools

- `cangjie_lsp_definition`: Jump to symbol definition
- `cangjie_lsp_references`: Find all references to a symbol
- `cangjie_lsp_hover`: Get type info and documentation
- `cangjie_lsp_symbols`: List all symbols in a document
- `cangjie_lsp_diagnostics`: Get errors and warnings
- `cangjie_lsp_completion`: Get code completion suggestions

## Usage

- All positions are 1-based (line and character)
- File paths must be absolute paths to .cj files

## Workflow

1. `cangjie_lsp_symbols` - explore file structure
2. `cangjie_lsp_hover` - understand symbol types
3. `cangjie_lsp_definition` - navigate to definitions
4. `cangjie_lsp_references` - find all usages
5. `cangjie_lsp_diagnostics` - check for errors
